name: Insurance Certificate Analysis
description: AI-driven tool for extracting structured data from insurance certificates.

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction img-head\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\" style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 15px;\"\u003e\r\n    \u003cimg src\u003d\"data:image/svg+xml;base64,\" \r\n    alt\u003d\"App Icon\"\r\n         style\u003d\"width: 30px; height: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eInsurance Certificate Extraction\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eOverview\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Extract structured data from insurance certificate PDFs using AI-powered form field recognition.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eInput\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Insurance certificate(s)\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eOutput\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Clean tables in downloadable and Excel-compatible format.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eBenefits\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Speeds up document handling with automation.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Minimizes errors in manual data entry.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Enhances insurance workflow efficiency.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html3",

      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,

appStages.name: Document-Analysis
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\" style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px;\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eDocument Analysis\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Upload an insurance certificate, load and extract its contents into two structured tables, and download the extracted results.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html2",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Workspace Name",
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "hidden": true,
      "hideLabel": true,
      "tableView": true,
      "defaultValue": "test",
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "validate": {
        "required": true
      },
      "key": "workspace",
      "type": "textfield",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Upload Insurance Certificate Document",
      "description": "Only (.PDF) files",
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "tableView": false,
      "storage": "base64",
      "webcam": false,
      "fileTypes": [
        {
          "label": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "key": "file",
      "type": "file",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Destination Path",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "/home/sparkflows/fire-data/data/GENAI/GenAI-Applications/Insurance-Certificate-Extraction/test/excel",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "calculateValue": "value \u003d\"/data/GENAI/GenAI-Applications/Insurance-Certificate-Extraction/\"+ data[\"workspace\"]",
              "key": "destinationPath",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Columns",
              "columns": [
                {
                  "components": [],
                  "width": 6,
                  "offset": 0,
                  "push": 0,
                  "pull": 0,
                  "size": "md",
                  "currentWidth": 6
                },
                {
                  "components": [
                    {
                      "label": "Load Document",
                      "action": "event",
                      "showValidations": false,
                      "theme": "info",
                      "customClass": "float-right btn-outline rounded",
                      "tableView": false,
                      "key": "read",
                      "properties": {
                        "successMessage": "File is Uploaded",
                        "for": "file"
                      },
                      "type": "button",
                      "event": "upload",
                      "input": true
                    },
                    {
                      "label": "Start Extraction",
                      "action": "event",
                      "showValidations": false,
                      "theme": "info",
                      "block": true,
                      "customClass": "rounded float-right btn-outline",
                      "tableView": false,
                      "key": "execute2",
                      "type": "button",
                      "event": "execute",
                      "input": true
                    }
                  ],
                  "width": 6,
                  "offset": 0,
                  "push": 0,
                  "pull": 0,
                  "size": "md",
                  "currentWidth": 6
                }
              ],
              "key": "columns",
              "type": "columns",
              "input": false,
              "tableView": false
            },
            {
              "label": "Download Result",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "rounded float-right",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "viewPdf1",
              "properties": {
                "successMessage": "File is Uploaded"
              },
              "type": "button",
              "event": "viewPdf",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns1",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Ouput Folder",
      "hidden": true,
      "tableView": true,
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "calculateValue": "value \u003d\"/data/GENAI/GenAI-Applications/Insurance-Certificate-Extraction/\"+ data[\"workspace\"] +\"/excel/\"",
      "key": "folderPath",
      "type": "textfield",
      "input": true,
      "keyModified": true
    },
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-bottom:1px solid #E0E0E0;margin-left:-16px;margin-right:-16px;\"\u003e\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Go Back",
      "action": "event",
      "showValidations": false,
      "theme": "secondary",
      "customClass": "btn-outline  mt-0 float-left rounded",
      "tableView": false,
      "key": "back",
      "type": "button",
      "event": "back",
      "input": true,
      "hideOnChildrenHidden": false,
      "keyModified": true
    }
  ]
}
